participant_1.background:
The weather is perfect for practicing my juggling tricks.
i live in chicago.
I live with my furry friends and enjoy my creative hobbies.
I like to read books and watch documentaries to expand my knowledge.
I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that.

participant_2.background:
I am a loner, but I do enjoy my hobbies.
I'm proud of my daughter and mom!
I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.
my friend once bought me a car.
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.

content.text: It was a little chilly out today, but perfect for practicing my juggling tricks!
I'm not much of a juggler, but I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
Do you like to listen to music while you bike?
I do! I love to listen to all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably alternative rock.
I love alternative rock too! I also like listening to indie rock and folk music.
I love folk music! I recently went to a folk music festival and it was so much fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a folk music festival before, but I would love to go one day.
You should definitely go to one! They're so much fun and you get to hear some great music.
I'm sure I would! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about music.
Me too! I love talking about music.
Well, I'm going to go for a bike ride now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice ride
